column39: westridge rd. the family will receive friends before the service at the church between 12:30 pm and 2:00 pm. june mc. math was born december 17
column40: 1928 in chatham county to the late wade and annie harris. she was a member of mt. vernon united methodist church for many years before moving her membership to trinity church. june retired from sears and roebuck where she worked for over 30 years and became one of the first female buyers. she loved reading and enjoyed going to movies on friday afternoons; most of all
column44: and great-grandmother. she is survived by her husband paul mc. math
column45: sons mike moody and wife beverly
column46: alan mc. math and wife carolyn
column47: and steve mc. math and wife brenda; grandsons josh moody and wife nicole
column50: and joel mc. math; great grandson dylan moody; sister frances cockman and husband jimmy
column52: great nephews and a great niece along with friends. in addition to her parents
column53: she was preceded in death by her brother jimmy harris and nephew tommy cockman. in lieu of flowers
column54: memorials may be made to trinity church
